articles.description: The embattled US President urged his party to move forward and end its recent drama over his candidacy.
articles.content:

articles.title: Video: Biden ‘Ignores’ Young Black Girl Who Was Visibly Happy To See Him, Netizens React
articles.description: A video of US President Joe Biden ignoring a young, Black American lady while addressing supporters at an event in Madison, Wisconsin is going viral on social media. Republicans have latched on to the video and are using it to attack Joe Biden as they find the incumbent on the backfoot following the disastrous performance at the debate against Donald Trump.
